sections.paragraph: + A city in the low country of Judah, named between Zanoah and Tappuah. (Joshua 15:34) + A city on the border of Issachar. (Joshua 19:21) allotted with its "suburbs" to the Gershonite Levites, (Joshua 21:29) probably Jenin, the first village encountered on the ascent from the great plain of Esdraelon into the hills of the central country.
